ygData.subject: Re: Rambling a bit, was: Re: [EQ_women] Marriage question......
ygData.msgSnippet: Salutations Kristina! Thanks for the note. I ve got most of the stuff for the tunic back together. Still need to find that pristine dragon scale though. If the
ygData.messageBody:
Salutations Kristina!

Thanks for the note. I've got most of the stuff for
the tunic back together. Still need to find that
pristine dragon scale though.

If the Misty Thicket one is much harder than finding
this one I'm either very unlucky, or I feel for anyone
trying it. I have searched and searched, I have no
idea how many Forest Draklings I've killed but at
least several dozen and I have yet to come across a
single Pristine scale except for the one I bought from
someone else and then lost.

It's good to know that it's a no fail task, but I'm
not sure what you mean by the level being <=20. Does
that mean if my sewing skill goes above 20 I can't
make it any more? It's 19 now.

It's kind of funny thinking about it since apparently
I managed to find a way to fail the no fail quest.
:o)

Anyway, thanks for all your help.

:o)
Brangvyne
lvl 13 Wood Elf Ranger


--- Kristina Fiero <kauthu@...> wrote:
>
> the sewing/smithing levels for all newbie armor is
> <=20 but its also No Fail, which means you'll always
> suceed in your attempts at creating newbie armor.
>
> Misty Thicket is the newbie zone for the Halflings
> they have a different type of drakling that they
> need scales from and only spawn every 30 minns and
> theres only about a 25% chance that the draklings
> will even have a scale let alone one of the 3
> different special types that you need, plus their
> pristine scales (the very rare drop off this rare
> spawn) is no drop so its much much harder to get the
> newbie tunics for rangers and rogues over there. So
> far I've done just about all the newbie armor quests
> for almost every race/class combo so if anyone has
> questions just let me know.
>
>
>
> ---------------------------------
> Do you Yahoo!?
> New DSL Internet Access from SBC & Yahoo!
